name: Ed's 'Ead - Extremely Bare Bones 'Eadition
description:
NOTE: YOU MAY ENCOUNTER A BUG WHERE THE SOUND DOESN'T WORK CORRECTLY DURING THE INTRO (THERE SHOULD BE A SOUND ONCE THE GAME TITLE APPEARS IMMEDIATELY AFTER THE MADE WITH UNITY LOGO). PLEASE PUT THE GAME INTO FULLSCREEN IF YOU ENCOUNTER THIS PROBLEM (YOU CAN THEN SWITCH BACK IF YOU WISH) AND HOPEFULLY IT SHOULD WORK CORRECTLY.

Ed's lost 'is 'ead! Well, not so much LOST as it was dug up an' nicked by an 'orrible mangy mutt! Use Ed's body to find Ed's 'Ead by first locating a shovel and then making your way to the mount where poor Ed's been buried by that conniving canine! Move Ed's body left and right with the arrow keys and jump with the spacebar. Complete 3 levels to reunite Ed with 'is 'Ead and let 'im get back to 'is cosy, permanent dirtnap. Just watch out for that pesky water, Ed's body can't stand the stuff!

This Extremely Bare Bones 'Eadition was made for the gamedev.tv "Death is only the beginning!" Game Jam in May 2022.
